Template.HtmlPart:
{{name}}, Welcome to FindShadowing.com

Thanks for Signing Up!

We are honored to help you find physicians to shadow on your path towards a medical career. Shadowing a physician is a great way to get exposure to doctors and see what a career in medicine is all about. We are here to simplify the shadowing process, connecting you with physicians who welcome learners like yourself. Getting the most out of your shadowing experiences is up to you! Get started now by looking for physicians availabe in your area at FindShadowing.com!

Thank you again for joining our community and we look forward to helping you find meaningful shadowing experiences. Feel free to contact us with any issues, concerns or questions.


Ryan Gray, M.D.

Find All My Podcasts at Meded Media
